mapper.select: select (CASE count(r.`value`) WHEN '1' THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END) as is_gray from gray_bootstrap b left join gray_rule_iterm ri on b.`id`=ri.`bootstrap` left join gray_rule r on ri.`id`=r.`iterm` left join gray_strategy_rule sr on r.`id`=sr.`rule` left join gray_strategy s on sr.`strategy`=s.`id` left join gray_plan p on s.`id`=p.`strategy` WHERE b.`state`=1 and b.`name`=#{bootstrap} and s.`state`=1 and p.`state`=1 and if(s.`forward_reverse`=0, r.`value`=#{ruleValue}, r.`value`!=#{ruleValue});

select r.`id` as ruleId, r.`value` as ruleValue, b.name as bootstrapName, s.`forward_reverse` as strategyForwardReverse from gray_bootstrap b left join gray_rule_iterm ri on b.`id`=ri.`bootstrap` left join gray_rule r on ri.`id`=r.`iterm` left join gray_strategy_rule sr on r.`id`=sr.`rule` left join gray_strategy s on sr.`strategy`=s.`id` left join gray_plan p on s.`id`=p.`strategy` WHERE b.`state`=1 and s.`state`=1 and p.`state`=1;
